hibernate-mapping.query: select new csdto ( cs.Balance, cs.CurrencyCode, cs.Date_Time, cs.HomeAmount, cs.SourceBranchCode ) from PFMORM00036 as cs where Convert(char(10),cs.Date_Time,111) = :datetime and cs.CurrencyCode = :currencycode and cs.SourceBranchCode = :sourcebr and cs.Active = true
select new csdto ( sum(cs.Balance) ) from PFMORM00036 as cs where convert(char(10),cs.Date_Time,111)= :datetime and cs.SourceBranchCode = :sourcebr and cs.Active = true

Delete from PFMORM00036 as cs where convert(char(10),cs.Date_Time,111) between convert(char(10),:fromDate,111) and convert(char(10),:toDate,111) and cs.Active = true and cs.SourceBranchCode = :branchCode
select new csdto ( Max(c.Id) ) from PFMORM00036 as c

Select new csdto ( cs.Balance, cs.CurrencyCode, cs.Date_Time, cs.HomeAmount, cs.SourceBranchCode ) from PFMORM00036 as cs where convert(char(10),cs.Date_Time,111) <= :date_time and cs.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr and cs.Active = true order by Date_Time desc
